EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Smite Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and a Ranged attack. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Smite Foe (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: Smite your enemy with a melee attack that deals an additional 2[W] damage. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Smite Foe (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: Smite your enemy with a ranged attack that deals an additional 2[W] damage. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Resilience of Battle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Damage Reduction 5/-, +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Sanctuary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For 20 seconds, you gain +20 Sacred bonus to Physical Resistance. Spell Point Cost: 10 Spell Points Cooldown: 1 minute Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: War Caster: Blur
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Blur is added to your spellbook as a level 2 spell. In addition, you permanently benefit from the effect of the Blur spell. Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: War caster: Haste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Haste is added to your spellbook as a level 3 spell. Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with your Favored weapon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Implacable Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Strength, Wisdom and Charisma variants.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Implacable Foe (Strength)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and their attacks will deal 10% additional damage. For the next 18 seconds, these bonuses will refresh every 3 seconds on you and each ally that remains in range. These effects will expire 5 seconds after they are no longer refreshed. Cooldown: 3 minutes Passive: Divine Vessel now triggers on reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25. +4 Strength +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Implacable Foe (Wisdom)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and their attacks will deal 10% additional damage. For the next 18 seconds, these bonuses will refresh every 3 seconds on you and each ally that remains in range. These effects will expire 5 seconds after they are no longer refreshed. Cooldown: 3 minutes Passive: Divine Vessel now triggers on reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25. +4 Wisdom +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Implacable Foe (Charisma)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and their attacks will deal 10% additional damage. For the next 18 seconds, these bonuses will refresh every 3 seconds on you and each ally that remains in range. These effects will expire 5 seconds after they are no longer refreshed. (Cooldown: 5 minutes) Passive: Divine Vessel now triggers on reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25. +4 Charisma +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Might
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose your upgrade: Divine Might/Presence or Will

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Might
EnhancementSelection.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Antirequisite: This ability cannot be trained if you have any other Battle Trance abilities. Spell point Cost: 21 Spell Points Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Divine Might
Stance.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Will
EnhancementSelection.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Antirequisite: This ability cannot be trained if you have any other Battle Trance abilities. Spell point Cost: 21 Spell Points Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Divine Will
Stance.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] maximum hp.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Righteous Weapons I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Sacred Touch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you heal allies (with positive energy damage spells) they gain +[1/2/3] AC and +[1/2/3] PRR for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search and Spot. Rank 3: +1 save vs traps

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Smite Weakness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you strike an enemy with Smite Foe, they gain four to seven stacks of Vulnerable. (For each stack, the target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Wall of Steel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Physical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Righteous Weapons II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Inflame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and your nearby allies gain a +[2/3/4] bonus to Armor Class, Attack Rolls, and Damage Rolls. Duration: 30 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Action Boost Haste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Magic Backlash
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When an enemy damages you with a spell, there is a [10/20/30]% chance they will be knocked down. (Does not affect bosses.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Radiant Flourish
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attck

EnhancementSelection.Name: Radiant Flourish (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Melee Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Enemy takes 1/2/3d6 Light Damage. This damage scales at 200% with the higher of your Melee and Ranged Power. Non-boss enemies have a small chance to be blinded with no save. 6 Second cooldown

EnhancementSelection.Name: Radiant Flourish (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Ranged Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Enemy takes 1/2/3d6 Light Damage. This damage scales at 200% with the higher of your Melee and Ranged Power. Non-boss enemies have a small chance to be blinded with no save. 6 Second cooldown

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Righteous Weapons III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Greater Inflame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Inflame now also grants a +[2/3/4] bonus to Saving Throws and a +[5/10/15]% bonus to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic Energy Absorption.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Ameliorating Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you strike an enemy with Smite Foe, you and your nearby allies are healed by 1d3 per character level, and benefit from the effects of the Lesser Restoration spell. (The heal from Ameliorating Strike is affected by your Positive Spell Power) You may only perform this AOE heal once per time you use this skill.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Silence the Wicked
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and a Ranged attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Silence the Wicked (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Melee Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Affected enemy can't cast spells for 4/8/12 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Silence the Wicked (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Ranged Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Affected enemy can't cast spells for 4/8/12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Righteous Weapons IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Holy Striker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Doublestrike or Doubleshot

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Striker
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10]% Doublestrike

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Sniper
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10]% Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Your god has imbued you with power and skill in combat, granting a +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with weapons, a +6 Sacred bonus to Strength, and a base attack bonus equal to a fighter of the same level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Vessel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks generate a stack of Divine Conduit. When Divine Conduit reaches 25, all stacks are cleared and you gain one charge of this attack. (Max uses: 1. You cannot gain stacks of Divine Vessel while you have any uses of this attack.) Choose between Melee and Ranged attacks:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Vessel (Melee Attack)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active: Melee Favored Weapon Cleave Attack: Expend 1 charge. Take a shot with your bow, dealing +5[W] damage. Each affected enemy is hit by a meteor, taking 1 to 4 Fire and 1 to 4 Light Damage per character level. (Damage from the meteor is affected by Fire and Light Spellpower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Vessel (Ranged Attack)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active: Ranged Favored Weapon Attack: Expend 1 charge. Make a sweeping weapon attack against all nearby enemies for +5[W] damage. Each affected enemy is hit by a meteor, taking 1 to 4 Fire and 1 to 4 Light Damage per character level. (Damage from the meteor is affected by Fire and Light Spellpower.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Wrathful Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your religion's favored weapon in your main hand, you gain +3 to hit and damage, and +9 Universal Spell Power. When you score a Vorpal Hit with your religion's favored weapon, your attacks gain 10d6 Light Damage on hit for the next 12 seconds. This damage scales at 200% with the higher of your Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Champion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wearing Medium armor (or in Mithral body feat), you gain +5% Doublestrike, +5% Doubleshot, +5 to confirm Critical hits and damage (before weapon multipliers).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Intervention
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active: Divine Intervention: Ward your target against fatal damage. Hit point damage cannot lower a warded ally's hit point total below -9. When a warded ally is incapacitated, this effect heals the target after a few seconds for 10 to 39 hit points and then fades. Spell Point Cost: 30 spell points. Cooldown: 2 minutes
